title: "Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching"

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
yesterday i started to get this message and when it comes i cant join a Queue
my runes and emotes are reseting too...

replies.body: Heya, this specific error is usually caused by a network issue struggling to reach our services.  I recommend double checking anti-virus settings and port forwarding in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
